categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Barson Nestroph was a male colonel in the army of the Galactic Empire. He was the father of Heater, a pilot in the New Republic's Riot Squadron. Several weeks after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, Heater and a number of other pilots aboard the EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Hellion's Dare played Who? What? Where?, a game where each participant set out who they wanted to be informed first of their death, their cause of death, and where it would happen. Heater chose Nestroph to be the first to hear of his death, expressing his desire for his father to know he made something out of himself.
Barson Nestroph was mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, the initial volume of the Star Wars: Alphabet Squadron trilogy written by Alexander Freed.
